Reference

All functions

detectImports()

Bayesian test for the presence of imports

detectImportsESD()

ESD test for the presence of imports

detectImportsFAST()

Quick test for the presence of imports

keyStats()

Compute dates of nodes, number of lineages through time, terminal branch lengths and coalescent intersection

plot(<resDetectImports>)

Plotting method for DetectImports results

plotBoth()

Plot a dated phylogeny and Ne function

plotCoalInt()

Plot the coalescent intervals

plotImports()

Plot the tree and imports

print(<resDetectImports>)

Print function for DetectImports results

simCoal()

Simulation of coalescent dated phylogeny given a fluctuating Ne(t) function

simImports()

Simulation with imports

summary(<resDetectImports>)

Summary function for DetectImports objects
